# Mortal Kombat 9 Kratos Pc Downloadk: How to Play as the God of War in MK9
 
If you are a fan of both Mortal Kombat and God of War, you might be wondering how to play as Kratos in Mortal Kombat 9 on PC. Kratos is a guest character who was originally exclusive to the PlayStation 3 version of MK9, but thanks to some clever modding, you can now enjoy his brutal moves and fatalities on your computer. In this article, we will show you how to download and install the Kratos mod for Mortal Kombat 9 on PC.

## What is the Kratos Mod for Mortal Kombat 9?
 
The Kratos mod for Mortal Kombat 9 is a fan-made modification that replaces one of the existing characters in the game with Kratos, the protagonist of the God of War series. The mod also adds Kratos' voice, music, stage, and weapons to the game, making it feel like he is a part of the official roster. The mod was created by a user named Lord Dragu on MKSecrets.net, who has also made other mods for MK9 such as Shao Kahn and Goro.
 
## How to Download and Install the Kratos Mod for Mortal Kombat 9?
 
To download and install the Kratos mod for Mortal Kombat 9 on PC, you will need to follow these steps:
 
1. Make sure you have Mortal Kombat 9 installed on your PC. You can buy it from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/237110/Mortal_Kombat_Komplete_Edition/) or other online platforms.
2. Download the Kratos mod from [this link](https://www.mksecrets.net/forums/eng/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=4666). You will need to register an account on MKSecrets.net to access the download page.
3. Extract the contents of the downloaded zip file to your MK9 folder. The default location is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\MKKE.
4. Run the game and select Freddy Krueger as your character. The mod will replace him with Kratos.
5. Enjoy playing as the God of War in Mortal Kombat 9!

## Tips and Tricks for Playing as Kratos in Mortal Kombat 9
 
Here are some tips and tricks for playing as Kratos in Mortal Kombat 9:

- Kratos has a unique fighting style that combines melee attacks with his Blades of Exile and various magical abilities. He can use his blades to extend his combos and reach his opponents from a distance.
- Kratos can also summon different weapons from his past adventures, such as the Nemean Cestus, the Bow of Apollo, and the Head of Helios. Each weapon has its own special move that can deal massive damage or stun the enemy.
- Kratos' X-Ray move is called Rage of Sparta, which unleashes a barrage of attacks with his blades and weapons. His fatalities are Divine Retribution, which impales the opponent with his blades and rips them apart, and Olympus' Wrath, which summons a lightning bolt from Zeus to strike the opponent.
- Kratos' stage is called The Chamber of the Flame, which is based on his final battle with Zeus in God of War III. The stage has interactive elements such as fire pits and spikes that can be used to damage or finish off the opponent.
- Kratos' theme music is called Brothers of Blood, which is taken from God of War III's soundtrack. It adds an epic atmosphere to his fights and matches his character perfectly.
